full_output.summary: As an aspiring Engineering student, Currently pursuing a degree in Information Technology, I have cultivated a strong foundation in statistical analysis, machine learning, and programming language such as Python. Throughout my academic journey, I've applied these skills to various projects, including predictive modeling, data visualization, and exploratory data analysis. My experience with tools like SQL, NumPy and Pandas has equipped me to handle complex datasets and derive actionable insights.

projects.name: Customer Attrition Rate Prediction in Telecom using Machine Learning and Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed predictive models using machine learning and deep learning techniques to forecast attrition rates in the telecom industry. Conducted thorough data preprocessing and feature engineering to extract insights from large datasets, enhancing model performance. Implemented various machine learning algorithms (e.g., Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, SVM) and deep learning architectures (e.g., RNNs, CNNs) for accurate prediction of customer churn behavior (achieved accuracy 98%). Presented Paper in Conference organized by Poornima University.

projects.name: Face Recognition
projects.description: Objective: Develop a system that can accurately identify and verify individuals based on facial features captured from images or video. Components: Utilize computer vision techniques such as Haar Cascades for face detection and recognition; integrate with databases to store and retrieve facial embeddings or features for comparison.

projects.name: Pharmacy Website
projects.description: Launched a comprehensive pharmacy website that processed prescription, integrated with electronic health records (EHR) systems, and enhanced user experience with easy navigation and secure payment options. Enhanced the pharmacy website's performance by implementing advanced search functionalities.

full_output.name: Aviral Dubey
